column4: currently using XChat for UBUNTU, anyone know of a better client?
better is relative, I know 'other' clients, I prefer xchat over 'others' though
kvirc is a bit colorful, has avatars and stuff, you can also use pidgin or gaim for irc, there's also konversation, or quassel, as I said, I prefer xchat :)
kubuntu already comes with Quassel irc, I've used konversation, you may like kvirc over it, GUI wise  http://lwn.net/images/ns/grumpy/irc/kvirc.png
